title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to right click on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, in the current version (Photon), this menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior: A popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: Currently, no popup menu appears when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior: A popup menu should appear to allow the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
